3. QUY ĐỊNH VỀ SỬ DỤNG THIẾT BỊ CNTT <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.028,t=0.031,r=0.427,b=0.090), with ID 2e0a5baa-20cf-421c-b651-66c77e58d4a9 -->

Summary : This image is a logo for a company named "Icetea Software," featuring a stylized red geometric symbol above the company name.

logo: Icetea Software

Logo Elements :
  • The logo consists of a red geometric symbol resembling two interlocking "S" shapes or a stylized chain link, formed by angular lines within a diamond outline.
  • Two small red diamond shapes are positioned symmetrically on the left and right sides of the main symbol.
  • Below the symbol, the company name is written as "Icetea Software" with "Icetea" in a light gray font and "Software" in bold black font.
  • The logo is centered on a white background.

Typography & Colour :
  • "Icetea" uses a thin, sans-serif, light gray font.
  • "Software" uses a bold, sans-serif, black font.
  • The geometric symbol and side diamonds are in a solid red colour.

Dimensions & Placement :
  • The geometric symbol is centered above the text.
  • The text is horizontally aligned, with "Icetea" and "Software" on the same line.

Analysis :
  • The logo uses a modern, minimalist design with a strong geometric motif, likely to convey a sense of technology and reliability. The contrast between the light and bold text draws attention to the word "Software," emphasizing the company's industry. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.893,t=-0.000,r=0.970,b=0.094), with ID a2f5be1c-237b-457d-89f6-5378b4a28b85 -->

Summary : This flowchart outlines the restrictions and approval process for employees (CBNV) regarding the use and transport of personal IT devices (such as laptops, iPads, USBs) in and out of a company, with specific limitations based on device type and network/storage capabilities.

flowchart:
# Nodes :
  • "CBNV không tự ý mang các thiết bị CNTT (laptop, Ipad, USB...) ra/vào công ty" (large rightward arrow)
  • "Đăng ký sử dụng với IT, xin phê duyệt của ban ISO và ký cam kết bảo mật thông tin" (large rightward arrow)
  • "Không hoặc hạn chế sử dụng" (rounded rectangle)
  • "Thiết bị có khả năng kết nối trực tiếp vào mạng (wire/wireless) hoặc gián tiếp qua máy trạm (wifi router, network card external/usb,…)" (rectangle)
  • "Thiết bị có khả năng là vật lưu trữ, trung chuyển dữ liệu (USB,…)" (rectangle)
  • "Thiết bị là cầu nối giữa các thiết bị khác (switch, router, các loại converter…)" (rectangle)

# Connectors :
  • The first arrow (left) leads to the second arrow (right), indicating a process: employees must not bring devices without approval, and must register and get approval if needed.
  • The "Không hoặc hạn chế sử dụng" node branches into three rectangles, each describing a category of restricted devices.

# Layout :
  • Two large horizontal arrows at the top, sequentially from left to right.
  • Below, a vertical stack: one rounded rectangle ("Không hoặc hạn chế sử dụng") on the left, branching rightward into three rectangles describing device types.
  • All elements use blue backgrounds with white text.

# Analysis :
  • The flowchart visually enforces a strict policy: employees cannot freely bring personal IT devices into/out of the company.
  • Any use of such devices requires registration, ISO approval, and a signed confidentiality commitment.
  • Devices with network connectivity, storage/transfer capability, or bridging functions are specifically restricted or prohibited.
  • The diagram clearly categorises device types and the approval workflow, emphasising information security and controlled access. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.013,t=0.111,r=0.936,b=0.983), with ID f3183085-8b47-4302-acbd-72052a95d72f -->
